title: Operations Management
description: This course focuses on the strategic design and management of operations processes and policies to match supply with demand in an economically sustainable manner. Credit will not be awarded for both MGT 6501 and MGT 6350.

prerequisites: MGT 6500 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
